title: Programmer/Analyst I
summary: Built desktop and web tools in a banking environment using Access/DB2/Argo Data, ASP, validation JavaScript, and SQL Server.
description: Developed desktop applications that pulled from Access and DB2/Argo Data sources for banking teams.
Implemented reporting and data-access front-ends to surface financial data accurately.
Built data-driven ASP pages with validation JavaScript for internal web workflows.
Designed and implemented SQL Server applications to support the web and desktop tools.
Worked within regulated banking processes to keep data handling reliable and auditable.
